 ETAS: Approved Libraries – Active & Deactivated 
 
 
 
 
 Updated June 1, 2021 The libraries listed below have been approved or deactivated for  Emergency Temporary Access Service  under the  Terms of Service . Faculty, staff, and students on active campuses -- when logged in to  www.hathitrust.org  -- may access digitized items in HathiTrust that correspond to physical books held by their own library when that book is not currently available due to the temporary disruption in service caused by the global health emergency.  Active American University of Beirut Amherst College Boston University  Brandeis University Brock University Bryn Mawr College California Digital Library Carleton University Case Western Reserve University Claremont Graduate University Claremont McKenna College College of Wooster
